- Location: Bathtub/shower alcove; left wall with controls, grab bar on right.
- Materials: White enamel tub; white ceramic wall tiles (4x4); chrome escutcheons; beige plastic knob handles; stainless handheld shower hose.
- Observations: Handheld shower hose present inside tub; tub spout/diverter not visible; white wrapped vertical pipe/tube protruding into tub interior (likely incomplete install or protection).
- Condition: Tile/grout appear intact; no visible cracks or water staining; small area around edge looks clean.
- Safety: Grab bar appears secured; verify fasteners for safety-critical use. Recommend completing faucet/spout installation and removing temporary wrap.
